code: import React from'react';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChatProfile(){const{id}=useParams();const[profile,setProfile]=React.useState(null);React.useEffect(()=>{fetch(`http://localhost:3000/buddies/${id}`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setProfile(data));},[id]);if(!profile)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:profile.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profile.profilePic,alt:profile.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Choose a conversation topic:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/conversation/${id}?topic=political`,children:"Political"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/conversation/${id}?topic=emotional`,children:"Emotional"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/conversation/${id}?topic=scientific`,children:"Scientific"})})]})]});}export default ChatProfile;
